<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">[Faerie Fire](/Spells.aspx?ID=107)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Light" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=100" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 337 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

**Area** 10-foot burst

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 5 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

All creatures in the area when you cast the spell are limned in colorful, heatless fire of a color of your choice for the duration. Visible creatures can't be concealed while affected by _faerie fire_. If the creatures are invisible, they are concealed while affected by _faerie fire_, rather than being undetected.
name: Faerie Fire
